DOC.brief_title: Predicting Adherence Heart-Healthy Diet Lean Obese Individuals
DOC.detailed_description: Adherence , `` stick diet '' important successful initial weight loss keep weight long term ( 1 ) . While early behavioral dietary adherence associate great weight loss , stick diet plan difficult . It clear adherence diet plan ( even one produce weight loss ) hard whether people overweight difficulty adhere diet plan compare people relatively lean . < TAB > < TAB > The main aim study evaluate dietary adherence 3 group individual participate 6-week heart-healthy dietary intervention program . Two group [ 1 ( BMI < 25 kg/m ( 2 ) ) 2 . Obese ( BMI great equal 30 kg/m ( 2 ) ) ] receive heart-healthy diet design maintain weight , third group [ 3 . Obese ] give heart-healthy diet 35 % less daily calorie need lose weight . Participants attend one counseling session per week contact randomly 1x/week study staff completion 24-hour dietary recall . Prior start assign heart-healthy dietary intervention , participant complete questionnaire include question motivate follow diet , lose weight , change eating pattern . These finding may help u understand factor affect adherence , help u design weight loss study improve people 's ability stick diet intervention .
